Function# OSStringCreate

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
OSStringPtr OSStringCreate(const char * cstring, size_t length);
```

## [See Also](/documentation/DriverKit/OSStringCreate#see-also)

### [Creating a String](/documentation/DriverKit/OSStringCreate#Creating-a-String)

[`withString`](/documentation/driverkit/osstring/withstring)Allocates an OSString object with a copy of an OString object.[`withCString`](/documentation/driverkit/osstring/withcstring-4wsql)Allocates an OSString object with a copy of a c-string.[`withCString`](/documentation/driverkit/osstring/withcstring-721oh)Allocates an OSString object with a copy of a c-string, up to a given length.[`withCStringNoCopy`](/documentation/driverkit/osstring/withcstringnocopy)Allocates an OSString object with a copy of a c-string.[`free`](/documentation/driverkit/osstring/free)
